fulltext:
PROFILE
Extremely motivated to constantly develop my skills and grow
professionally. As an ambitious and hard-working individual, I handle
multiple tasks on a daily basis competently, working well under the
pressure. More than 4 years working on online industry as a web
developer, I've learned & got experiences at web development
environments, program languages, database, and management operation
system. I'm confident in my ability to come up with interesting ideas for
project. 
NGUYEN NHUT TRINH
WEB DEVELOPER

Design mockup, database schema and write specification
document for team members do their works. 
Develop web application with JAVA, Javascript, ReactJs and
Material UI 
Develop RESTful API providing JSON data format for mobile and
web application. 
Exploit web system 
Tracking performance, improve connection speed, customize sql
statement to improve query database performance 
Co-worker, support team member when they're getting stuck. 
FULL STACK WEB DEVELOPER
